alert.note: Alert for Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 2:52PM CDT until April 01 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected tonight into Friday morning. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. Snowfall expected Friday morning into Friday evening. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Ransom County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the weekend commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
